amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.__. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used by the Secretary of Defense to implement an enrollment fee for the TRICARE for Life program under chapter 55 of title 10, United States Code, that does not exist as of the date of the enactment of this Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to implement an enrollment fee for the TRICARE for Life program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A058) Agreed to by recorded vote: 399 - 17 (Roll no. 497).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A058) Agreed to by recorded vote: 399 - 17 (Roll no. 497).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A058) offered by Mr. Stearns.
